languages.text: "Довольно, брат Сумерки. Да не изольется из уст твоих больше слов, чем положено услышать ложноверцам. Незнание — их обитель, пусть пребудут в ней".
"Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."
languages.original_text: "Довольно, брат Сумерки. Да не изольется из уст твоих больше слов, чем положено услышать ложноверцам. Незнание — их обитель, пусть пребудут в ней".

languages.text: “够了，暮光兄弟，你不该和这些异教徒多费口舌。无知是他们的避难所，就让他们永远困在无知之幕中吧。”
languages.original_text: "Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."

traits.locale_text: “够了，暮光兄弟，你不该和这些异教徒多费口舌。无知是他们的避难所，就让他们永远困在无知之幕中吧。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: « Assez, frère Crépuscule. Vos lèvres ne prononceront pas un mot de plus en présence de ces païens. Laissez-les dans leur ignorance, qu'elle reste leur prison. »
languages.original_text: "Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."

traits.locale_text: « Assez, frère Crépuscule. Vos lèvres ne prononceront pas un mot de plus en présence de ces païens. Laissez-les dans leur ignorance, qu'elle reste leur prison. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: 「もういい、薄明の兄弟よ。それ以上話す必要はない。奴らにとっては無知こそ最大の苦しみ。暗闇の迷路に閉じ込めたままにしくがよい」
languages.original_text: "Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."

traits.locale_text: 「もういい、薄明の兄弟よ。それ以上話す必要はない。奴らにとっては無知こそ最大の苦しみ。暗闇の迷路に閉じ込めたままにしくがよい」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: «Basta, Hermano Crepúsculo. No digas nada que no puedan oír los paganos. La ignorancia es su refugio, dejémosles atrapados en ella».
languages.original_text: "Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."

traits.locale_text: «Basta, Hermano Crepúsculo. No digas nada que no puedan oír los paganos. La ignorancia es su refugio, dejémosles atrapados en ella».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Genug, Bruder Zwielicht. Eure Lippen werden kein Wort mehr sprechen, als ein Heide hören darf. Ignoranz ist ihr Kloster. Lasst sie ruhig dort in ihrer Gefangenschaft darben."
languages.original_text: "Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."

traits.locale_text: "Genug, Bruder Zwielicht. Eure Lippen werden kein Wort mehr sprechen, als ein Heide hören darf. Ignoranz ist ihr Kloster. Lasst sie ruhig dort in ihrer Gefangenschaft darben."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Bu kadarı kâfi Rahip Seher. İmansızların duyması gerekenden daha fazlasını açık edecek tek bir kelime daha zikretmeyeceksin. Cehalet, onların çıkmazı olacak. Bırak da düştükleri çukurda kalsınlar."
languages.original_text: "Enough, Brother Twilight. Your lips will not speak a word more than it is a heathen's place to hear. Ignorance is their cloister. Let them remain trapped there."
